meanings.definition: Stylish or fashionable in a luxurious way.
meanings.sent1: The ritzier dress sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses the ritzier outfits for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The ritzier shoes made him feel like a movie star.
meanings.sent4: Her ritzier taste in decor transformed the room into a palace.
meanings.sent5: The ritzier jewelry caught everyone's attention at the party.

meanings.definition: More expensive or upscale than something else.
meanings.sent1: The ritzier car had all the latest features.
meanings.sent2: Their ritzier vacation included a stay at a luxury resort.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his ritzier watch was worth more than his car.
meanings.sent4: The ritzier restaurant in town was always fully booked.
meanings.sent5: She dreamt of owning a ritzier house with a pool and a garden.
